title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 340 - Date Of Membership For Optional Members Of The New York State And Local Employees' Retirement System
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 340

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 19, 40, 500, 519, 600, 614

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
